column4: perhaps you have your browser set to claim that it's Internet Explorer? That would fool the download page.
the presence of .exe files doesn't necessarily mean that it's *only* bootable in Windows
nope, that was my first thought and I've tried it with two different browsers, neither of which are claiming to be IE
nope, but the machine's refusal to boot from the stick (which is what prompted me to look at the files) does...
